title: Cannot unlock skin permanently from loot
body: Unlocked a Crimson Akali skin but cannot unlock it permanently.Everytime i try to unlock it says 'Redeemed Failed'

replies.body: Thanks for the report!  Can you try again now and let me know if it's still an issue?
Nope still cant redeem the skin. Welp :'(
I'm also having this problem right now after rerolling 3 skins.
